JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Restaurant staff for  Aroma fanø, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
RESTAURANT AROMA FANOE

 

Restaurant Aroma on Fanoe is searching for chefs and serving staff for the season, 2022, starting now J

 

Restaurant Aroma Fano is a family restaurant on a small island on the westcost of Denmark.

We are looking for persons for the kitchen and persons for the serving in the restaurant.

If you are a couple, it would be perfekt :-)

 

Fanoe is a small island on the westcoast of Denmark, and is well visited by tourists every summer.

The restaurant is located in the center of the old town, which is also the main town on the island, Nordby. You can see us on facebook :  https://www.facebook.com/aromafano

The address is Grønnevej 2, 6720 Fanø, Denmark, if you wish to google it for streetview. 

Salary is decided individually according to experience. The staff at Aroma will live in a building just next to the restaurant. At your stay we will provide free food on all working days.

 When you are working at Aroma we expect you to help whereever help is needed, this means cooking, cleaning, serving, dishwashing – we help each other out.

During the season it is very busy at Aroma – we expect you to handle stressfull situations well. As we have an open kitchen, positive communication is important at all times. 

Im looking forward to hear from you – I only accept applications in English, please.

Please contact me at cafearomadk@gmail.com(link sends e-mail), thank you

Best regards

 

Kurt Schmidt
